The midwife caring for and monitoring Mary Jane during labour offered her a companion of 
her choice. Mary Jane wanted to be accompanied by her sister. The midwife gave directions to 
Mary Janeâ€™s sister as to when and how to call for assistance. 
Given that another woman was in labour in the same room, the midwife used a divider 
between beds to provide more privacy.
Mary Jane is with her sister and receiving instructions on relaxation techniques for pain relief.
